languages.text: "Значит, ты не до конца отдался тому, что я пытался раскрыть тебе". {n}Маражай склоняет голову набок и внимательно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Преодолеть собственную природу... оказалось тебе не по силам. Моя маленькая игра так и осталась игрой — моя ли вина в том, что она не превратилась в нечто большее?"

"So you did not fully surrender to what I was trying to reveal to you." {n}Marazhai tilts his head to the side and looks at you intently.{/n} "Overcoming your own nature... proved beyond your capabilities. My little game remained a game — is it my fault that it did not turn into something more?"
languages.original_text: "Значит, ты не до конца отдался тому, что я пытался раскрыть тебе". {n}Маражай склоняет голову набок и внимательно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Преодолеть собственную природу... оказалось тебе не по силам. Моя маленькая игра так и осталась игрой — моя ли вина в том, что она не превратилась в нечто большее?"

traits.locale_text: "So you did not fully surrender to what I was trying to reveal to you." {n}Marazhai tilts his head to the side and looks at you intently.{/n} "Overcoming your own nature... proved beyond your capabilities. My little game remained a game — is it my fault that it did not turn into something more?"

"So you did not fully surrender to what I was trying to reveal to you." {n}Marazhai tilts his head to the side and looks at you intently.{/n} "Overcoming your own nature... proved beyond your capabilities. My little game remained a game — is it my fault that it did not turn into something more?"

"So you did not fully surrender to what I was trying to reveal to you." {n}Marazhai tilts his head to the side and looks at you intently.{/n} "Overcoming your own nature... proved beyond your capabilities. My little game remained a game — is it my fault that it did not turn into something more?"

"So you did not fully surrender to what I was trying to reveal to you." {n}Marazhai tilts his head to the side and looks at you intently.{/n} "Overcoming your own nature... proved beyond your capabilities. My little game remained a game — is it my fault that it did not turn into something more?"

languages.text: “我试图向你揭露真相，是你自己没有全心全意地感受。”{n}玛拉斋将头歪向一边，专注地看着你。{/n}“看来，要求你克服自己的本性……恐怕是根本做不到的事情。这场小小的游戏到最后，也仅仅是场小小的游戏罢了，没有变成某种更加深刻的东西。莫非这是我的错吗？”
languages.original_text: "So you did not fully surrender to what I was trying to reveal to you." {n}Marazhai tilts his head to the side and looks at you intently.{/n} "Overcoming your own nature... proved beyond your capabilities. My little game remained a game — is it my fault that it did not turn into something more?"

traits.locale_text: “我试图向你揭露真相，是你自己没有全心全意地感受。”{n}玛拉斋将头歪向一边，专注地看着你。{/n}“看来，要求你克服自己的本性……恐怕是根本做不到的事情。这场小小的游戏到最后，也仅仅是场小小的游戏罢了，没有变成某种更加深刻的东西。莫非这是我的错吗？”

languages.text: «Entonces no te has entregado plenamente a lo que he intentado revelarte». {n}Marazhai ladea la cabeza y te mira atentamente.{/n} «Trascender tu propia naturaleza... tantear los límites de tus capacidades. Mi jueguecito era solo eso, un juego; ¿acaso es culpa mía que no haya pasado a más?».
languages.original_text: "So you did not fully surrender to what I was trying to reveal to you." {n}Marazhai tilts his head to the side and looks at you intently.{/n} "Overcoming your own nature... proved beyond your capabilities. My little game remained a game — is it my fault that it did not turn into something more?"

traits.locale_text: «Entonces no te has entregado plenamente a lo que he intentado revelarte». {n}Marazhai ladea la cabeza y te mira atentamente.{/n} «Trascender tu propia naturaleza... tantear los límites de tus capacidades. Mi jueguecito era solo eso, un juego; ¿acaso es culpa mía que no haya pasado a más?».

languages.text: « Alors, cela signifie que vous n'avez pas réussi à vous abandonner suffisamment pour comprendre la vérité que je cherchais à vous révéler. » {n}Marazhai incline légèrement la tête sur le côté en vous observant attentivement.{/n} « Vous n'avez pas réussi à... surmonter votre nature profonde. Mon petit jeu n'est pas devenu quelque chose de plus ambitieux. Mais est-ce vraiment ma faute ? »
languages.original_text: "So you did not fully surrender to what I was trying to reveal to you." {n}Marazhai tilts his head to the side and looks at you intently.{/n} "Overcoming your own nature... proved beyond your capabilities. My little game remained a game — is it my fault that it did not turn into something more?"

traits.locale_text: « Alors, cela signifie que vous n'avez pas réussi à vous abandonner suffisamment pour comprendre la vérité que je cherchais à vous révéler. » {n}Marazhai incline légèrement la tête sur le côté en vous observant attentivement.{/n} « Vous n'avez pas réussi à... surmonter votre nature profonde. Mon petit jeu n'est pas devenu quelque chose de plus ambitieux. Mais est-ce vraiment ma faute ? »

languages.text: "Dann habt Ihr Euch also nicht vollständig dem hingegeben, was ich Euch offenbaren wollte." {n}Marazhai legt den Kopf zur Seite und sieht dich eindringlich an.{/n} "Eure eigene Natur zu überwinden ... hat sich als außerhalb Eurer Möglichkeiten herausgestellt. Mein kleines Spiel ist nur ein Spiel geblieben – bin ich schuld daran, dass nicht mehr daraus geworden ist?"
languages.original_text: "So you did not fully surrender to what I was trying to reveal to you." {n}Marazhai tilts his head to the side and looks at you intently.{/n} "Overcoming your own nature... proved beyond your capabilities. My little game remained a game — is it my fault that it did not turn into something more?"

traits.locale_text: "Dann habt Ihr Euch also nicht vollständig dem hingegeben, was ich Euch offenbaren wollte." {n}Marazhai legt den Kopf zur Seite und sieht dich eindringlich an.{/n} "Eure eigene Natur zu überwinden ... hat sich als außerhalb Eurer Möglichkeiten herausgestellt. Mein kleines Spiel ist nur ein Spiel geblieben – bin ich schuld daran, dass nicht mehr daraus geworden ist?"

languages.text: 「ならば、お前は俺が明らかにしようとしたことに、完全には身を委ねていなかったというわけだな？」{n}マラズハイは首をかしげ、あなたをじっと見つめる。{/n}「己の本性に打ち勝つってことは…お前の能力を超えたものであることが証明されたな。俺様のささやかな遊びは遊びのままだった。それ以上のものにならなかったのは、俺のせいなのか？」
languages.original_text: "So you did not fully surrender to what I was trying to reveal to you." {n}Marazhai tilts his head to the side and looks at you intently.{/n} "Overcoming your own nature... proved beyond your capabilities. My little game remained a game — is it my fault that it did not turn into something more?"

traits.locale_text: 「ならば、お前は俺が明らかにしようとしたことに、完全には身を委ねていなかったというわけだな？」{n}マラズハイは首をかしげ、あなたをじっと見つめる。{/n}「己の本性に打ち勝つってことは…お前の能力を超えたものであることが証明されたな。俺様のささやかな遊びは遊びのままだった。それ以上のものにならなかったのは、俺のせいなのか？」

languages.original_text: "So you did not fully surrender to what I was trying to reveal to you." {n}Marazhai tilts his head to the side and looks at you intently.{/n} "Overcoming your own nature... proved beyond your capabilities. My little game remained a game — is it my fault that it did not turn into something more?"

languages.text: "Ben içinde yatanları açığa çıkarmaya çalışırken sen kendini tamamen bırakmadın." {n}Marazhai, başını yana yatırarak dikkatle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Kendi tabiatını alt etmenin... Kabiliyetlerinin çok ötesinde olduğu ortaya çıktı. Küçük oyunum, oyun olarak kaldı. Bundan daha fazlasına dönüşmemesi benim kabahatim mi?"
languages.original_text: "So you did not fully surrender to what I was trying to reveal to you." {n}Marazhai tilts his head to the side and looks at you intently.{/n} "Overcoming your own nature... proved beyond your capabilities. My little game remained a game — is it my fault that it did not turn into something more?"

traits.locale_text: "Ben içinde yatanları açığa çıkarmaya çalışırken sen kendini tamamen bırakmadın." {n}Marazhai, başını yana yatırarak dikkatle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Kendi tabiatın alt etmenin... Kabiliyetlerinin çok ötesinde olduğu ortaya çıktı. Küçük oyunum, oyun olarak kaldı. Bundan daha fazlasına dönüşmemesi benim kabahatim mi?"
